definitions: 素早い[すばやい] (adj-i) fast, quick, prompt, nimble, agile,quick (to understand), sharp (judgement)
english: Hmm? Pretty fast.
japanese: おや……？なるほど……すばやいな

definitions: 盗む[ぬすむ] (v5m, vt) to steal
english: 200 Gil Stolen!
japanese: ２００ギル盗まれた！

definitions: 返す[かえす] (suf, v5s) to return (something), to restore, to put back,to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn,to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate,to repeat ..., to do ... back
帰す[かえす] (v5s, vt) to send (someone) back, to send (someone) home
孵す[かえす] (v5s, vt) to hatch, to incubate
english: &^%$!! Gimme back my money!!
japanese: チクショ～！！オレの金、かえせ～！！

definitions: 眩む[くらむ] (v5m, vi) to be dazzled by, to be dizzied by, to be disoriented by,to be lost in (greed, lust, etc.),to become dark
クラム (n) clam,crumb
english: Greed…A perfect example of human nature.
japanese: 金に目がくらむ……じつに人間らしい行動だな

definitions: 実に[じつに] (adv) indeed, really, absolutely, truly, actually, very, quite
english: Greed…A perfect example of human nature.
japanese: 金に目がくらむ……じつに人間らしい行動だな

definitions: 人間らしい[にんげんらしい] (adj-i) human, humane
english: Greed…A perfect example of human nature.
japanese: 金に目がくらむ……じつに人間らしい行動だな

definitions: くすねる (v1, vt) to pilfer, to filch, to swipe
english: Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
japanese: オレ様から金をくすねるたあいい度胸じゃねえか！！

definitions: 度胸[どきょう] (n) courage, bravery, pluck, nerve, grit, guts
english: Steal MY money, will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!
japanese: オレ様から金をくすねるたあいい度胸じゃねえか！！

definitions: 見慣れる[みなれる] (v1, vi) to become used to seeing, to be familiar with
english: You don't see one like that everyday…
japanese: ……みなれない格好をしているな……

definitions: 知らん顔[しらんかお] (n, vs) feigned ignorance, pretending not to recognize (somebody),unconcerned air, indifference
english: Who do you think she is? I don't recognize her face.
japanese: なんやろ、アレ。知らん顔ですなぁ

definitions: おっぱい (n) breasts, boobies, tits,breast milk
english: Hey, boobs! Try that again! Just one more time!
japanese: やい、このオッパイ女！もう１回、もう１回勝負しろ！

definitions: 品[しな] (n) article, item, thing, goods, stock,quality,flirtatiousness, coquetry
支那[しな] (n) China
しな (suf) having just started...
科[しな] (n) Japanese linden (Tilia japonica)
english: I won't lose this time! Take your time and get ready. Holler when you're ready!
japanese: 今度は負けないからね！時間をやるから、用意しなよ。カクゴができたらかかってきな！

definitions: 戦う[たたかう] (v5u, vi) to make war (on), to wage war (against), to go to war (with), to fight (with), to do battle (against),to compete (against),to struggle (against adversities, etc.), to fight, to contend, to resist
english: No way I'm going to fight with a punk like you more than once!
japanese: フーンだ、誰がアンタらみたいなザコと何度もたたかうもんか！

definitions: 治療[ちりょう] (n, vs, adj-no) medical treatment, cure
english: I'll save enough for the doctor bill! Next time, you won't be as lucky!
japanese: ケガの治療費はいただいとくよ！次はようしゃしないからなー！

definitions: 費[ひ] (n-suf) cost, expense
直[あたい] (n) Atai (post-Taika hereditary title often given to regional administrators)
english: I'll save enough for the doctor bill! Next time, you won't be as lucky!
japanese: ケガの治療費はいただいとくよ！次はようしゃしないからなー！

definitions: 謝する[しゃする] (vs-s) to thank,to apologize, to apologise,to say farewell, to retreat, to retire,to refuse,to pay back, to settle old scores
瀉する[しゃする] (vs-s) to have diarrhea,to vomit
english: I'll save enough for the doctor bill! Next time, you won't be as lucky!
japanese: ケガの治療費はいただいとくよ！次はようしゃしないからなー！

definitions: たらしい (suf, adj-i) (after a noun or the stem of an adjective) seeming very... (usu. with a negative connotation)
english: Thinkin' of running away? Stay and fight! FIGHT, I said!
japanese: ム、逃げる気？ちゃんと勝負しろ！しろったらしろ！

definitions: 無駄[むだ] (n, adj-na) futility, waste, uselessness, pointlessness, idleness
english: You're wasting your time
japanese: やるだけムダだぜ

definitions: 実力[じつりょく] (n) (real) ability, true strength, merit, efficiency, competency,arms, force
english: Hmm, just as I thought. What do you expect with my skills?
japanese: ヘヘ、や～っぱりそうか。ま、アタシの実力からいえばそれも当然だネ

definitions: 名乗る[なのる] (v5r, vi) to give one's name (as), to introduce oneself (as),to claim to be, to call oneself, to wear the title of,to reveal oneself (as), to admit to being,to adopt as one's name, to take (a name),to call out the goods one is selling
english: What are you talking about!? You're the one who should go first!
japanese: ヘン、何言ってんだい！そっちが先になのるのがマナーってもんだろ！
